alert.note: Alert for Huntingdon; Juniata; Mifflin; Northern Centre; Northern Clinton; Northern Lycoming; Snyder; Southern Centre; Southern Clinton; Southern Lycoming; Union (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 11:17PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT MUCH OF THE CENTRAL MOUNTAINS... At 1115 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Bellefonte to near State College to near Huntingdon. Movement was northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of up to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation possible. Locations impacted include... Williamsport, Lock Haven, Lewistown, Bellefonte, Jersey Shore, Carroll, Woodward, Pleasant Gap, Lamar, Zion, Belleville, Mill Hall, Milroy, Avis, and Centre Hall. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
